resources.string: First official release.
Added three lists for books: read, in progress and to read.
Books can now be sorted and searched for.
Added polish translation.
Added 10 different color themes.
Added proper settings for the application.
Cosmetic UI changes
Finished books can have number of pages and finish date.
Theme changing without restarting the app.
UI/UX redesign, corrected colors of themes.
Searching for books and sorting is now ignoring diacritic characters.
Corrected toggling keyboard when adding a new book.
Update check on app startup and when clicked on app version in settings.
Added statistics page and yearly reading challenge.
Added option to filter finished books by years.
Added trash for deleted books.
Design and layout changes.
Implemented Open Library\'s API for adding books.
Books added from Open Library can have covers displayed.
Books can now have start date, ISBN and Open Library ID set.
Fixed books showing multiple times in lists.
In progress and to read lists are now taking whole designed space.
Start and finish date buttons are now properly displayed in \"add book dialog\".
Book\'s start and finish date are now only displayed when should be.
After adding a book from Open Library user is redirected to proper list.
Search results from Open Library without covers are now clearly indicated.
Yearly challenge can not be set to 0 now, repaired dismissing the dialog.\"
Added buttons for clearing set dates and text boxes.
Improved look of items from Open Library in read lists.
Dates and number of pages are now not required to add a new book.
Added counters for read lists.
Fixed display of covers in add book dialog.
Added confirmation alert dialog when deleting a book.
Added delete book button to display book fragment.
Fixed alert dialog about no challenge set when adding a new book.
Added option to backup and restore book\'s database.
Added option to scan book\'s barcode and look up it\'s ISBN.
Visual changes to app\'s icons, buttons, layouts.
Redesigned warning alert\'s button\'s look.
After changing app\'s theme the view stays in settings.
Added open source info on setup screen.
Corrected display on phones with large interface/font sizes.
Corrected rating bar\'s behaviour in add bok dialog.
When searching in Open Library button on keyboard can trigger search.
Books Tracker is now Openreads!
Improved statistics.
Changelog will be shown after app\'s update.
User can select which list will be shown at app\'s startup.
Rating can be set to half points and can have publish year set.
Displaying book view, statistics, setup screens and books lists got redesigned.
App will ask for feedback after 7 days since install or this update.
Fixed back button\'s behavior.
Saved book\'s search will not show deleted ones.
Corrected translations.
Corrected display on low dpi screens, improved graphs readability, fixed show book\'s details button, fixed fields when adding a book.
Books with 0 pages won\'t be counted as shortest in statistics.
Redesigned top button\'s in lists, added search animation.
Books covers are now saved in the app.
Book\'s can now be marked as favourite.
Default finish date is now the current day.
Unified adding new books and lots of design and behaviour changes.

string.name: changelog_1_8_0_e
string.b: Important! If after this update your book\'s covers are missing - edit book\'s details and save with no changes.

resources.string: Updated code\'s repository links.
You can now add notes to your books.
A lot of visual changes.
Added new statistics.
Day/night mode change in settings.
Improved app\'s colours.
Fixed new year bug that only current year\'s books are displayed.
You can now add tags to your books.
Books can be filtered by tags and finish date.
After reaching yearly goal you get a trophy!
Fixed updating rating from display book view.
Fixed book display view breaking after status change.
Statistics show covers of read books.
Reading targets can be set now both for books and pages.
Reading targets for previous years can be edited.
Fixed bug where filtering finished books by year would hide not read books.
First publish date is now correctly pulled from Open Library.
Books details display reading duration.
New book\'s status will default to list from which adding was started.
Added app\'s name to book lists, decreased buttons and text fields radius.
Changed loading progress indicator.
Added missing translations.
